Containers.Name: RDP-Boinc
Containers.Description: RDP-Boinc is a docker for the BOINC client and manager [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the RDP-Boinc configuration and library files will reside[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and app folder. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']3389[/span] is the RDP port[br] To access the BOINC manager, connect to the unraid IP via RDP client ([span style='color: #E80000;']user: boinc | password: boinc[/span])and click on the the desktop icon for calibre. Both the server and the GUI use the same database in the /config folder.
Containers.Overview: BOINC lets you contribute computing power on your home PC to projects doing research in many scientific areas. You can contribute to a single project, or to any combination of them. RDP-Boinc is a docker for the BOINC manager and client that can be accessed through RDP.
